string.text: Find "%s"
Nimble has asked you to find a specific firearm. It needs to be in mint condition. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
I have a client looking for a specific firearm and I need someone to help me find it. If you are interested I will give you more details. What do you say?

%s... That is what I need, but it must be in mint condition. The client is paying top dollar and he doesn't want a rusty piece of shit that will jam up in a life or death situation. I'll give you most of the profit since you are doing all the work. Come back when you find it, man.
This is a fine weapon. I think my client will be pleased when I deliver this to him. Here is what I owe you.
Расправа
Ликвидировать отряд сталкеров-должников, которые скрываются в «Слизнях».

Вот очередной раз убеждаюсь, что не надо делать добро бесплатно! Были тут одни зяблики, которые наобещали мне кучи артефактов со Свалки натаскать, затарились в долг снарягой, мягко говоря, по уши, да свалили! Чисто из принципа - помоги мне рассправиться с ними! Они сейчас в рядах «слизней» прячутся. За мной не заржавеет.
Хорошая работа. А хорошая робота хорошо оплачивается.
Contract killer
Sidorovich contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to Sidorovich for payment.

I have a list of outstanding bounties and stalkers that need taken care of. The worst kind of scum and villainy usually end up on this list... For various reasons. The Zone needs its trash taken out from time to time. What do you say, stalker, will you be my hired gun?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Clear area of mutants

Wolf asked you to purge an area of all mutant threats in order to ensure the safety of rookie village; as well as the stalkers who pass through Cordon. Reach the location and eliminate all mutants around the area. Return to Wolf for payment after your job is complete.

Stalker, I need someone to who is a bit more experienced than the rookies for a task. Cordon is becoming a very dangerous place with all this rampant mutant breeding going on. I need you to hunt around an area that I will mark on your PDA. The job is to kill any mutants you see. If you do this for me, it will earn you some cash. So will you?
Thank you, the rookies will be much safer now because of you. Here is your payment.
Find "%s"
%s are required by Xenotech to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.

I need a favour, man. A lot of stalkers come by here asking if I can tune their weapons a certain way but I can't. I just don't have the right tools. I would be able to perform upgrades on a greater variety of equipment if I can just get my hands on the right tools. Please, man, will you help me out?
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Okay, yeah, this is exactly what I need. Here, I promised you payment; take it.
Find "%s"
%s are required by Xenotech to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.

My business is booming now, more and more stalkers come to me when they need their weapon fine-tuned. But I could really use more tools. You brought me a quality toolkit last time but I need an even higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
I need an %s. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even pay you for it.
Yes, yes! Here is some cash, you deserve it.

Уничтожить бандитов на АТП
Организовать нападение на АТП и уничтожить бандитов, занимающих локацию.

Бандиты снова захватили АТП. Эти сволочи грабят и убивают всех, кто пользуется этой дорогой к деревне. Они отпугивают новичков, которые надеются найти тут убежище... В общем, нужно, чтоб ты о них «позаботился». Соглашайся! Пойдёшь ты не один, а ещё два добровольца.
Отлично сработал, сталкер! Держи, от чистого сердца.
